nodes.text: The Asteroid Dreadnought was a rumored Imperial Navy dreadnought that was camouflaged as a space rock during the reign of the Galactic Empire. Sometime between 14 and 19 AFE, Colonel Haxen Delto, head of the communications unit of Rebel Alliance Intelligence Service, wrote a report to Chief of Rebel Intelligence General Airen Cracken on Imperial superweapon projects, and included a section in the report regarding the rumors of the dreadnought.

In the report, Delto stated that he would not dismiss the rumors of the starship, despite noting that the Rebel Alliance's source inside Patriim was unreliable. The report was included in The Rebel Files, a data repository containing a non-electronic copy of sensitive information which would be uncovered decades later on the Mid Rim world of Durkteel.
The Asteroid Dreadnought was first mentioned in the boxed set and reference book Star Wars: The Rebel Files, which was released in 2017 and authored by Daniel Wallace.
